title: Shopping: Services (Usefulness 2)
description: Traveler usefulness 2/10 phrases for the Services subcategory within Shopping. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: People can send parcels using carrier services at convenience stores.
cards.romaji: konbini dewa takky bin o okuru koto mo dekimasu.
cards.japanese: コンビニでは宅急便を送ることもできます。
